Identification Result: Blockage in A/C system causing lack of cooling and compressor cut out due to overpressure.

Rectification Actions: Replace damaged/blocked component(s); evacuate system and recharge with the proper amount of refrigerant.
Rectification Result: Well done, changing the blocked component and recharging the system fixed the problem.
